name: Ninja Dash - Sushi Blade
description:
Your ninja training is over and it's time to become the shinobi warrior you're meant to be! Take your katana, grab some shurikens and step into the Ninja Dash World!

Jump, slash and run in a new fast paced game. Enjoy a fight experience: slice and smash the demons! Upgrade your samurai warrior and craft weapons. Follow the ninja path and recover the stolen Master Sushi! Ganbatte!

FEATURES of the best ninja game:

- Addictive hack and slash action in an new Japanese arcade running game!
- RPG elements: get resources and craft your own samurai weapons!
- Different ninja warriors to choose & level up!
- Two fingers control: Tap to jump, dodge, slash, smash or chop the Devil ninjas!
- Nonstop action: Challenge mode, Boss Battles and a lot of fun.
- Chain combos together, run and kill all the monsters and dragons, get a Super Soup & become GIANT!
- Train your shinobi in the Sensei's Dojo and be a unstoppable ninja arashi!
- Play offline or online, as you prefer!

Download now Ninja Dash for FREE. Be the helmet hero that will stop the Devil Shogun and end the Samurai War!

Leave the dojo, beat the war and get resources for crafting a new blade. Any shinobi who want to become a karate master must wear the best armours! Get the ultimate blazing sword or epic sais and level up them to increase their damage power. Collect the region relics and gather the ultimate ronin gears. Customize and upgrade your ninja shadow with helmets, armours, bracelets and other japanese shinobi items!

With the perfect katana slice and slash demons, perform ninja jumps and dodge their blade attacks. This is a ninja runner game, with addictive arcade experience. Master your karate skills and become a ninja arashi to defeat all the monsters! Run and revenge your Sensei!

Enjoy the addictive Hack n Slash game experience! A challenge appropriate for a samurai warrior: defeat the fire dragon and recover the master sushi!

Move like a shadow and fight the monsters as a legendary japanese warrior and ronin assassin. Dodge attacks, escape from dangerous situations using ninja skills, super speed, karate & ninja jumps. Overcome the Shogun horde and beat the shinobi war!

The path to become the ultimate warrior arashi is not only running, smashing enemies and jumping over the rooftops. During this samurai war you will face differents challenges:

- Revenge: Chop all the devil ninja shadows, claim your reward and gain experience to level up your heroes!
- Steam bomb: Transform yourself into a flying ninja chicken and escape the battle jumping and dashing through the japanese sky!
- Showdown: Try to survive the horde of demons, this is a non stop rush! An infinite battle in an endless runner mode!
- Boss Battle: Fight and complete all the missions and start de ronin siege against the Shogun castle! Defeat the fire dragon!

Start playing for FREE this real ninja challenge and beat 'em up!
